data_types.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We receive personal identifiers (such as your name, phone number, email address, billing address, shipping address, password, device ids, and IP address)... respond to requests, send you newsletters and other requested information... contact you or others about an order or delivery...
We receive personal identifiers... and use them to... contact you or others about an order or delivery, facilitate surveys, product reviews, product ratings, promotions, sweepstakes, and contests...
We receive personal identifiers... and use them to... send you newsletters and other requested information...
We receive personal identifiers... and use them to... fulfill and deliver orders for products and services...

data_types.data_mentioned_in_text: We may receive your payment card related information when you make payments to us
data_types.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We may receive your payment card related information when you make payments to us, and we will provide it to our payment processor.
We collect and generate commercial transaction information... to improve our service and product offerings...

data_types.data_mentioned_in_text: We and our service providers and third-party partners may collect your IP address
data_types.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We and our service providers and third-party partners will use the information... to draw inferences about your preferences... to help us provide you with personalized content and offers...

data_types.data_mentioned_in_text: We and our service providers... may automatically collect Personal Information using cookies and similar technology...
data_types.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We use this information... to tailor your experience on our Sites and our marketing efforts...

TP_sharing.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We currently use Google Analytics to collect and process certain website usage data.
